conclusion: Determine output and total power of power source connected to light bulb.
Line A is the U-I graph of the power source; curve B is the U-I graph of the light bulb.
Intersection point of graphs gives the operating point of the circuit.
Intersection point is at (2 A, 2 V).
Output power P_out = I × V = 2 A × 2 V = 4 W.
Total power P_total = I × V = 2 A × 2 V = 4 W.
Output power and total power are both 4 W.
